lines.text: Cheer up boy you only got 500 years to go.
[Spike is shown in the TV set dressed as a boxer punching himself and then knocks himself out]

[Spike now dressed as a referee starts the 10 count]
2, 4, 6, 8, 10 YOU'RE OUT!
Oh George its just beautiful. It's just what I always wanted. A television set.
Good morning, Warden. Uh, I'm in 20 years today. It's me anniversary.
Anniversary? Egads, it's our wedding anniversary. Gotta get my wife a present.
[verbally pronounced as six trillion, five hundred billion, four million, three-hundred eighty-five thousand, six hundred and thirty-two]
[quantity of spoonfuls of dirt, prison Dog, Spike counted in the 20-year attempted escape]
